Detailed Description

Handle the file security groupings that appear throughout.

Any of the headers or subheaders have security groupings. The object declared in this header is the storage container for such information

Definition in file FileSecurity.h.

void nitf_FileSecurity_destruct ( nitf_FileSecurity **  fs  ) 

Delete this object and null it.

Parameters:

NITF_BOOL nitf_FileSecurity_resizeForVersion ( nitf_FileSecurity *  fs,
nitf_Version  ver,
nitf_Error *  error 
)

Resizes the FileSecurity fields that are different sizes between different versions of the NITF specification. Calling with a valid nitf_Version will resize for that version. The default is to size for NITF 2.1 (NITF_VER_21)

Parameters:
fs The source object
ver The nitf_Version to use
error An error to populate upon failure
Returns:
NITF_SUCCESS if valid, NITF_FAILURE otherwise
